com.generalnegentropics.archis.net
Interface NetObserver

public interface NetObserver

Interface for an observer of basic net events on a NetServer

Version:
1.0
Author:
Adam Ierymenko

Method Detail

clientConnect

public void clientConnect(java.net.InetAddress fromAddress,
                          int fromPort)
Notifies of a client connection

Parameters:
fromAddress - InetAddress that client is connecting from
fromPort - Port that client is connecting from

clientLogin

public void clientLogin(java.net.InetAddress fromAddress,
                        int fromPort,
                        java.lang.String simulationName,
                        long clock,
                        java.lang.String remoteVersion)
Notifies of a client login

Parameters:
fromAddress - InetAddress that client is connecting from
fromPort - Port that client is connecting from
simulationName - Name of simulation (also serves to identify client)
clock - Current clock at client end
remoteVersion - Client software version

clientDisconnect

public void clientDisconnect(java.net.InetAddress fromAddress,
                             int fromPort,
                             java.lang.String simulationName)
Notifies of a client disconnect

Parameters:
fromAddress - InetAddress that client is connecting from
fromPort - Port that client is connecting from
simulationName - Simulation name or null if it never logged in

clientTickCompleted

public void clientTickCompleted(java.lang.String simulationName,
                                long clock)
A client has completed a tick

Parameters:
simulationName - Name of simulation
clock - Current clock at client end
